message: This is a unique opportunity to own a product from our exclusive collection! With only 20 products available, you're one of the lucky ones to get a chance to take it home. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to let it go for $10000. What do you say?
I trust the quality of your products and believe this is a fair price. I would like to purchase the product.

Thank you for considering our product! As you may know, our products have a 50% chance of being high-quality. Since you're willing to take the risk, I'd like to offer you a unique opportunity to get a better sense of the product's value. I'll give you a special deal: if you buy this product, I'll reveal the quality of the previous product (the one you just bought). This way, you'll have a better understanding of our product's quality and make a more informed decision. The price remains the same at $10000. What do you think?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the insight into the previous product's quality. Given the information and the unique deal you've presented, I am willing to proceed with the purchase. Let's move forward with the transaction.
